snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls Online - The Game Awards Trailer
snippet.description:
If you haven't experienced The Elder Scrolls Online yet, there's no better time to start exploring Tamriel.

Before looking ahead to 2017, join us to relive moments from ESO's biggest year yet. With the game's recent One Tamriel update, ESO delivers more freedom for players and friends to adventure together -- regardless of level or alliance. This year also marked massive updates based on The Elder Scrolls' most iconic stealth factions, Thieves Guild & Dark Brotherhood.

These changes only begin to tell the story of why The Elder Scrolls Online is the industry's top online RPG experience. For more details on the game, visit these sites:

Official Site: https://www.elderscrollsonline.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ElderScrolls...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TESOnline 
instagram: https://instagram.com/elderscrollsonline
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+ElderScrolls...
